content: क्षत्तृ {%<ab>m.</ab>%} [क्षद् संज्ञायाम् तृच् <ls>Uṇ. 2. 91</ls>] {@--1@} One who cuts or carves anything. {@--2@} An attendant, a doorkeeper. {@--3@} A coachman, charioteer. {@--4@} A man born of a Śūdra man and Kṣatriya woman; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Ms. 10. 9.</ls> {@--5@} The son of a female slave; ( {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} विदुर). {@--6@} Brahmā. {@--7@} A fish. {@--8@} One who fights from a chariot. {@--9@} The manager of a treasure (कोषाध्यक्ष).
